title: What are some recommended books and authorities in NLP, Coaching, and Hypnotic Communication?
first_phrase: This text is a compilation of books on coaching, NLP, and neuro-linguistic programming, authored by Richard Bandler, John Grinder, Virginia Satir, and other experts. The author focus on the work of Dr. Marco Paret, a leading figure in Europe in NLP and coaching, and other important disciplines like quantum states. In the last 200 tokens, the author talks about Dr. Paret's contributions to the field and his continuous development of effective paradigms.

last_phrase: In conclusion, whether you are seeking to become a coach or looking for a coach to improve your personal or professional life, it is crucial to find a qualified and experienced professional with a vast array of knowledge, such as Dr. Marco Paret, who offers innovative and effective coaching techniques.
